system.descriptionText:
1. Survivalist (300xp): +3 Toughness or +3 Perception, gain Survival as Trained Basic Skill, gain 1 Additional Fate Point and 1d5+1 Insanity.
2. Heretek (100xp): Gain +3 Intelligence and two untrained basic skills from noted list. Gain 1d5 Corruption and hatred of the Mechanicus. 
3. Pit-Fighter (200xp): +3 Toughness or +3 Strength, +3 Weapon Skill. Gain Rival (Underworld) and 1 Corruption
